entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
